project.description: This deployment project will deploy the 3 containers: • gobii-db-node • gobii-web-node • gobii-compute-node

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BUNDLE_PARENT_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Default data path /data

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_NETWORK_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Created Docker Network to connect all containers to. (gobii_net)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: NDD_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: NFS or persistent storage for data (/storage/persistent_data)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_CROP1_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This defines the crops and is the directory location in /data/gobii_bundle/crops/<crop_name> (dev)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_COMPUTE_HOST
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the communication path used for the containers across the docker network. If the deploy is multi-node and is not a swarm environment this should be set the the hosts external FQDN or IP. (gobii-compute-node)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_COMPUTE_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the container name used by the docker engine. (gobii-compute-node)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_COMPUTE_SSH_PORT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The external port to connect to compute container ssh. (2222)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_CRON_FILE_AGE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Number of minutes a job must be for cron to run the job. (+2)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_CRON_INTERVAL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Number of minutes between each cronjob execution. (2)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_DB_HOST
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the communication path used for the containers across the docker network. If the deploy is multi-node and is not a swarm environment this should be set the the hosts external FQDN or IP. (gobii-db-node)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_DB_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the container name used by the docker engine. (gobii-db-node)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_DB_PORT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: External Port for Postgres DB. (5433)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_WEB_HOST
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the communication path used for the containers across the docker network. If the deploy is multi-node and is not a swarm environment this should be set the the hosts external FQDN or IP. (gobii-web-node)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_WEB_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the container name used by the docker engine. (gobii-web-node)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_WEB_PORT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: External Port for tomcat Web UI. (8081)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GOBII_GID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The 'gobii' group gid on the host it is deployed on. (1001)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GOBII_UID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The 'gadm' user uid on the host it is deployed on. (1000)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_HUB_COMPUTE_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The dockerhub repo name (gobii_compute_vanilla_ubuntu)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_HUB_DB_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The dockerhub repo name (gobii_db_vanilla_ubuntu)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_HUB_WEB_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The dockerhub repo name (gobii_web_vanilla_ubuntu)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_HUB_USERNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The dockerhub user that owns the image repos. (gadm01)

hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_HUB_PASSWORD
hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.description: The password used by dockerhub user 'gadmreader' which is a collaborator on the repos owned by 'gadm01'.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_SUDOER_USERNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The host username for sudo. (gadm)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BUNDLE_TEMP_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The default location the bundle is created in the gobii-db-node image. (/var/gobii_bundle)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: POSTGRES_ETC
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The Postgres volume name for the gobii-db-node. (gobiipostgresetcubuntu)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: POSTGRES_LOG
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The Postgres volume name for the gobii-db-node. (gobiipostgreslogubuntu)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: POSTGRES_LIB
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The Postgres volume name for the gobii-db-node. (gobiipostgreslibubuntu)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_COMPUTE_CONTAINER_HOSTNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the hostname set for the container internally. (compute-node)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_DB_CONTAINER_HOSTNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the hostname set for the container internally. (db-node)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_WEB_CONTAINER_HOSTNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the hostname set for the container internally. (web-node)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ACTIVATE_ENCRYPTION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: KDCompute Active Encryption. (false)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: LIQUIBASE_CROP1_CONTEXTS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Liquibase seed data. (general,seed_general,seed_crop1)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: LIQUIBASE_CROP2_CONTEXTS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Liquibase seed data. (general,seed_general,seed_crop2)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_HUB_LOGIN_USERNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Dockerhub user used to login and pull images. (gadmreader)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TIMESCOPER_USER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The internal user set for configuration of timescope. (timescoper)

hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.name: TIMESCOPER_PASS
hudson.model.PasswordParameterDefinition.description: Password for internal timescope user [timescoper] set from TIMESCOPER_USER.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: TIMESCOPER_VERSION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Timescope Versioning. (2.2)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PORTAL_CONFIG_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Internal location of the GOBii Portal configuration in the gobii-web-node. (/usr/local/tomcat/webapps/gobii-portal/config/launchers.xml)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PORTAL_CROP1_URL_XPATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: XPath pointer to xml block for reconfiguring. (.//launcher[name='dev']/url)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PORTAL_CROP1_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The external link for the ExtractorUI. (http://localhost:8081/gobii-dev)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PORTAL_CROP1_NAME_XPATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: XPath pointer to xml block for reconfiguring. (.//launcher[name='dev']/name)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PORTAL_CROP1_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name Displayed for the ExtractorUI Crop Link. (dev)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PORTAL_TIMESCOPE_URL_XPATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: XPath pointer to xml block for reconfiguring. (.//launcher[name='Timescope']/url)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PORTAL_TIMESCOPE_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The external link for the Timescope UI. (http://localhost:8081/timescope)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PORTAL_OWNCLOUD_URL_XPATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: XPath pointer to xml block for reconfiguring. (.//launcher[name='File Browser']/url)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PORTAL_OWNCLOUD_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The external link for the ownCloud UI. (http://localhost:8084)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PORTAL_KDC_XPATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: XPath pointer to xml block for reconfiguring. (.//launcher[name='GDM Data QC']/url)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PORTAL_KDC_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The external link for the KDCompute UI. (http://localhost:8083/kdcompute)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PORTAL_LOADER_URL_XPATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: XPath pointer to xml block for reconfiguring. (.//launcher[name='GDM Data Loader']/url)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PORTAL_LOADER_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Link to the download page. Usually windows LoaderUI.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PORTAL_PORTAINER_URL_XPATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: XPath pointer to xml block for reconfiguring. (.//launcher[name='Portainer']/url)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PORTAL_PORTAINER_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The external link for the Portainer UI. (http://localhost:9000)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PORTAL_HAPLOTOOL_URL_XPATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: XPath pointer to xml block for reconfiguring. (.//launcher[name='Haplo Tool']/url)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PORTAL_HAPLOTOOL_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The external link for the Haplo Tool UI. (http://localhost:8085)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PORTAL_PEDVER_URL_XPATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: XPath pointer to xml block for reconfiguring. (.//launcher[name='PedVer']/url)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PORTAL_PEDVER_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The external link for the PedVer UI. (http://localhost:7000)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PORTAL_FLAPJACK_BYTZ_URL_XPATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: XPath pointer to xml block for reconfiguring. (.//launcher[name='Flapjack Bytes']/url)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PORTAL_FLAPJACK_BYTZ_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The external link for the Flapjack Bytes UI. (https://gobiiproject.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/GD/pages/238911510/Flapjack+Bytes)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: EXTERNAL_HOST_IP_HOSTNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: External FQDN or IP of the host.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: ENV_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The name of the environment which is shown on the emails. [Example: QA_TEST] **THIS VARIABLE CAN NOT CONTAIN ANY SPACES!!!**

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GOBII_DEPLOY_VERSION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This version is displayed. (Release X.Y.Z)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BUNDLE_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Directory location of the gobii_bundle (/data/gobii_bundle)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CONFIG_XML
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: File location of the gobii-web.xml is located. (/data/gobii_bundle/config/gobii-web.xml)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: AUTH_TYPE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The authentication protocol used to connect to LDAP/AD. (LDAP_CONNECT_WITH_MANAGER)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: LDAP_DN
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Distinguished Name reference. (uid={0})

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: LDAP_URL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Connection LDAP URL. (ldap://cbsugobiixvm06.biohpc.cornell.edu/dc=gobiiproject,dc=org)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: LDAP_BIND_USER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: LDAP Administrator user string. (cn=admin,dc=gobiiproject,dc=org)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: LDAP_BACKGROUND_USER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: LDAP background user used by webservices to query valid users. (gadm)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MAIL_HOST
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Mail Host. (smtp.gmail.com)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MAIL_PORT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Mail server Port. (587)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MAIL_USERNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Mail user account (gobii.rhodes@gmail.com)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MAIL_TYPE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Mail server type. (SMTP)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MAIL_HASH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Mail Server hash. (na)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CROP1
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Crop # name, this should match what is set for DOCKER_CROP1_NAME (dev)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: WEB_HOST
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The FQDN, IP or Docker Engine name given by DOCKER_WEB_NAME. This is used in the gobii-web.xml for internal/external communications between containers. (gobii-web-node)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: WEB_PORT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the gobii-web-node webservice port internally on the container. **If this is a multi-node deployment the external port set on DOCKER_WEB_PORT should be used instead.** (8080)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CROP1_CONTEXT_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The context path used on ExtractorUI URL. (/gobii-dev)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DB_HOST
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The FQDN, IP or Docker Engine name given by DOCKER_DB_NAME. This is used in the gobii-web.xml for internal/external communications between containers. (gobii-db-node)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DB_PORT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the gobii-db-node postgres port internally on the container. **If this is a multi-node deployment the external port set on DOCKER_WEB_PORT should be used instead.** (5432)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DB_USERNAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The main GOBII database user. (appuser)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DB_NAME_CROP1
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the name of the crop as it is referenced in the database tables. (gobii_dev)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: KDC_HOST
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The FQDN, IP or Docker Engine name given by DOCKER_KDC_NAME. This is used in the gobii-web.xml for internal/external communications between containers. (gobii-kdc-node)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: KDC_PORT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the external port connected to the containers internal port. (8083)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: KDC_PORT_INTERNAL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the internal port connected to the containers external port. (8080)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: KDC_CONTEXT_PATH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: kdcompute application context on server (kdcompute)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: KDC_JOB_START
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: KDcompute job start param (qcStart)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: KDC_JOB_STATUS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: KDcompute job status param (qcStatus)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: KDC_JOB_DOWNLOAD
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: KDcompute job downloand (qcDownload)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: KDC_JOB_CHECK_STATUS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Seconds to wait between status checks. (60)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: KDC_JOB_FAIL_THRESHOLD
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Minutes until job is hung (2880)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: KDC_PURGE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: KDcompute purge the jobs. (qcPurge)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: KDC_ACTIVE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: KDcompute is active (false|true) for gobii-web.xml. (true)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GOBII_RELEASE_VERSION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the image tagged for the image deployment. (release/2.2.2)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is the branch being used for the gobii.deploy.bash repo.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: LL_USER1
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: This is for the ownCloud LiveLinks Enablement. (admin)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: DOCKER_LL_PORT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: ownCloud port used for pointing livelinks to files. (8084)
